titleStmt.title: A Hermeticall banquet, drest by a spagiricall cook for the better preservation of the microcosme.
titleStmt.author: Howell, James, 1594?-1666.
Vaughan, Thomas, 1622-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Andrew Crooke, and are to be sold at the Green Dragon in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Attributed sometimes to Thomas Vaughan or to James Howell. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

place.placeName: the Green Dragon in S. Pauls Church-yard
